input.sentences: [male] drove into the city to get some vegetables .
he parked his car neatly outside the store .
inside the store he heads over ad grabs some vegetables .
checking out the people in the store were so nice to him .
now he drives home after getting his veggies .
output.sentences: While looking out his apartment window the man decided to go buy vegetables.
He drove his smartcar and parked on the sidewalk.
Inside the store the vegetables were neatly displayed for him to choose from.
He wandered around the store picking his items and then he paid.
He then drove home with his vegetables to start cooking dinner.
